DOC.detailed_description: A single-site , parallel-group , randomize control trial conduct ( Appendix C ) University Ottawa Heart Institute ( UOHI ) . Patients stable HF refer cardiac rehabilitation undergo baseline assessment randomly assign ( 1:1 ) either standard exercise therapy ( consist regular walk resistance exercise program ) Nordic walk . Follow-up measure take end intervention ( 12 week ) 14-week no-intervention observation period ( 26 week ) . After initial randomization treatment group , participant stratify treatment group randomly assign one three follow-up measurement condition 12 week : echocardiograph cardiopulmonary test ( N=80 ) ; cardiopulmonary test ( N=60 ) ; follow-up echocardiograph cardiopulmonary test ( N=76 ) . The primary outcome : ) change exercise capacity measure 6MWT ; b ) change disease-specific HRQL measure MLHFQ . Additional measure examine effect exercise intervention : cardiac performance ; leisure time activity ; cardio-respiratory fitness ; body composition ; neurohormonal activation ; generic HRQL
